title: 3 Idiots
description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them idiots.

title: Taare Zameen Par
description: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be lazy and a trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
description: Three lifelong friends take a road trip across Spain, confronting their fears, healing past wounds, and rediscovering what it means to truly live, love, and let go.

title: Dangal
description: Based on a true story, a determined father trains his daughters to become wrestling champions, breaking gender norms and inspiring a nation with their grit and glory.

title: Queen
description: After being left at the altar, a shy Delhi girl sets out on a solo honeymoon trip to Europe, finding her confidence, independence, and the power of self-love in the process.

title: Barfi!
description: In a world that often overlooks imperfection, a mute and deaf boy and an autistic girl create an unspoken love story that’s filled with innocence, laughter, and unbreakable bonds.

title: Piku
description: A witty slice-of-life drama about a fiercely independent architect juggling her demanding father’s eccentricities while discovering the humor and warmth in generational relationships.

title: Pink
description: Three young women become the targets of society’s harsh judgment until a retired lawyer takes up their case in a powerful courtroom drama that redefines consent and justice.

title: Kahaani
description: A pregnant woman’s relentless search for her missing husband takes her through the dark alleys of Kolkata, uncovering secrets that challenge everything she believed.

title: Haider
description: A haunting adaptation of Shakespeare’s Hamlet, set against the backdrop of conflict-ridden Kashmir, where a son seeks truth and revenge for his father’s mysterious disappearance.

title: Highway
description: A young woman experiences a profound transformation after being kidnapped just before her wedding. As she journeys through remote landscapes with her captor, she discovers freedom, inner strength, and a voice she never knew she had.

title: Tamasha
description: Behind the mask of everyday routine, a man discovers his lost self through storytelling and love, battling societal expectations to rediscover his true passion and identity.

title: Chak De India
description: A disgraced former hockey player redeems himself by coaching a ragtag women's team to international victory, inspiring a powerful tale of unity, resilience, and national pride.

title: Lagaan
description: Set in British-ruled India, a small village of farmers takes on their colonial oppressors in a high-stakes game of cricket to abolish unfair taxes, in an epic tale of courage and unity.

title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
description: A simple, introverted man marries a young woman in tragic circumstances and tries to win her heart through a secret new identity, leading to an emotional and heartwarming journey of love and transformation.

title: Black
description: Inspired by Helen Keller's life, this moving drama follows the extraordinary journey of a deaf-blind girl and her rebellious teacher who never gives up on her potential.

title: Raazi
description: A young Indian woman marries into a Pakistani military family to work as a spy during wartime, balancing loyalty, love, and sacrifice in this intense thriller based on true events.

title: Article 15
description: In a gripping social thriller, a newly posted IPS officer confronts the ugly truth of caste-based oppression in rural India, fighting for justice against systemic silence.

title: Andhadhun
description: A blind pianist’s life spirals into chaos after witnessing a murder, leading to a darkly comic series of twists that blur the lines between truth and deception.

title: Lunchbox
description: A misdelivered lunchbox sparks an unexpected exchange of notes between a lonely widower and a neglected housewife, turning into a heartwarming tale of love, food, and second chances.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
description: Three inseparable childhood friends navigate the trials of love, ambition, and adulthood, testing their bond and shaping their individual paths in life and relationships.

title: Masaan
description: Two parallel stories of grief, love, and hope unfold along the Ganges, exploring the weight of societal pressure and the strength it takes to break free from it.

title: Neerja
description: Based on a true story, this powerful biopic follows Neerja Bhanot, a brave flight attendant who risked her life to save passengers during a hijacking.

title: URI: The Surgical Strike
description: Based on true events, the film follows a brave Indian Army Major who leads a covert operation against militants after a deadly attack on an army base, showcasing courage, strategy, and patriotism.

title: Drishyam
description: When his family is threatened, a man goes to extraordinary lengths to protect them, crafting the perfect cover-up in this gripping mystery thriller.

title: Mimi
description: A small-town dancer agrees to become a surrogate for a foreign couple, but unexpected twists challenge her strength, motherhood, and sense of self.

title: Dil Se
description: A radio journalist falls deeply in love with a mysterious woman, unaware of the political storm she’s tied to in this intense romantic tragedy.

title: MS Dhoni: The Untold Story
description: From a small-town ticket collector to India's cricketing legend, this biopic chronicles the journey of Mahendra Singh Dhoni’s rise to greatness.

title: Rockstar
description: A naive college boy transforms into a tortured rockstar as he experiences heartbreak, artistic passion, and the pain of fame in this musical epic.

title: Badhaai Ho
description: When a middle-aged couple faces an unexpected pregnancy, their adult son must deal with embarrassment, society, and an evolving definition of family.

title: Udaan
description: A teenager expelled from boarding school returns to his authoritarian father, dreaming of freedom, literature, and a life beyond control.

title: Chhichhore
description: A group of estranged college friends reunite to support a troubled son, reliving their hilarious and heartwarming hostel days filled with life lessons.

title: Rang De Basanti
description: College students awaken their patriotism as they reenact stories of India's freedom fighters, only to take justice into their own hands in the present day.

title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
description: A young mute girl from Pakistan loses herself in India with no way to head back. A devoted man with a magnanimous spirit undertakes the task to get her back to her motherland and unite her with her family.

title: Anand
description: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
description: Four runaway crooks take shelter in a bungalow which is owned by a blind couple.

title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
description: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

title: Stree
description: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named Stree who abducts men in the night.
